alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Ashtabula County through 645 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Orwell, or 14 miles south of Ashtabula, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andover, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, Cherry Valley and Rock Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
